articles.title: My Path Wasn't Linear, But It Makes Sense Now
articles.excerpt: A reflection on my unconventional journey from pixel-perfect IE6 implementations to modern React development, and how every detour added value to my skillset.

articles.title: From Lego Bricks to Digital Products: My Journey as a Builder
articles.excerpt: How my childhood passion for building with Lego blocks evolved into crafting digital experiences, and why the fundamental joy of creation remains the same.
